忠信.definition: faithful and honest; loyal and sincere

忠南大學校.definition: Chungnam National University, Daejeon, South Korea

忠君愛國.definition: (idiom) to be faithful to the ruler and love one's country

忠告.definition: to give sb a word of advice; advice; counsel; a wise word

忠心耿耿.definition: loyal and devoted (idiom); faithful and true

忠恕.definition: loyalty and consideration for others; magnanimity (ideal virtues in Confucianism)

忠清.definition: Chungcheong Province of Joseon Korea, now divided into North Chungcheong province 忠清北道[Zhong1 qing1 bei3 dao4] and South Chungcheong province 忠清南道[Zhong1 qing1 nan2 dao4] of South Korea

忠清北道.definition: North Chungcheong Province, South Korea, capital Cheongju 清州市

忠清南道.definition: South Chungcheong Province, South Korea, capital Daejeon 大田[Da4 tian2]

忠清道.definition: Chungcheong Province of Joseon Korea, now divided into North Chungcheong province 忠清北道[Zhong1 qing1 bei3 dao4] and South Chungcheong province 忠清南道[Zhong1 qing1 nan2 dao4] of South Korea

忠烈.definition: sacrifice oneself for one's country; martyr

忠縣.definition: Zhong County or Zhongxian, a county in Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2qing4]

忠言逆耳.definition: loyal advice jars on the ears (idiom)

忠貞不渝.definition: unswerving in one's loyalty (idiom); faithful and constant
